description:
The "Drifter" saved by Haru rests up at a bar where Haru works. Then comes Geld, a Celestial Emperor Army executioner. He took great pleasure in hunting down the remnants of the "Red Dragon Party" that once stood in revolt against the Celestial Emperor. Haru tries to defeat Geld, even if it means suicide for himself, but then the drifter pulls off his cloak, revealing Kenshiro, successor to the Divine Fist of the North Star!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aitsu wa Itsu Mezameru no ka...!?
あいつはいつ目覚めるのか...!?
